data.eml:eml: A new stygobiont species of Halocaridinides Fujino & Shokita, 1975 (Crustacea, Decapoda, Caridea, Atyidae) from caves on Socotra Island (Yemen), with notes on the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fransen, Charles H. J. M., Damme, K. Van (2018): A new stygobiont species of Halocaridinides Fujino & Shokita, 1975 (Crustacea, Decapoda, Caridea, Atyidae) from caves on Socotra Island (Yemen), with notes on the genus. Zootaxa 4442 (2): 241-261, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4442.2.3
